Title: Regulates the cutting, topping and removal of trees upon rights of way by providers of electric service; requires the planting of replacement trees in certain cases
Summary: Regulates the cutting, topping and removal of trees upon rights of way by providers of electric service; requires the planting of replacement trees in certain cases; provides for the enforcement of such provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to tree cutting, topping and removal along electricity distribution lines
